abstract: For a typed λ-calculus we develop an algorithm that, given some partial information about what must happen at run-time, will work out what actually can be computed at compile-time and what must be deferred to run-time.

authors.name: F. Nielson
authors.affiliation: Department of Computer Science, The Technical University of Denmark, DK-2800 Lyngby, Denmark

title: Automatic binding time analysis for a typed λ-calculus
